text: Hey, does anyone knows if the discussion in this community forum has been implemented? The idea to have a “buying role” as a deal property. If it wasn’t, it will be great to hear some ideas from whom have already implemented it. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Buying-Roles-as-a-Deal-Property-rather-than-a-Contact-Property/idi-p/348482>

Hello everyone, I have a question that I haven't been able to solve. Does anyone know how to set up a process that can run every hour, every day, where an API is constantly executing to fill data in HubSpot? Is there documentation for this? Can it be developed within HubSpot, or does it have to be developed in an external application?
I use Render for hosting CRON scripts for recurring API calls
I should say that the reason I use CRON externally is because I don't want the activity feed being filled every hour with a workflow
Something to really consider when setting up a workflow which runs every hour.
